title: Spring Greens with Strawberries and Candied Pecans
directions: Combine all the above ingredients in a large salad bowl, drizzle with 1/2 cup White Balsamic Vinaigrette or other salad dressing, toss to combine.
ingredients: 4 cups spring mix of leafy greens
2 cups Romaine heart lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges in natural juices, drained
1 small red onion, sliced into thin rings
1/2 cup Candied Pecans for garnish, recipe for Candied Pecans
